requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU i3-2320 or AMD FX-6300 Six-Core Processor(3500 MHz) equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Ti or Radeon(TM) RX 460 Graphics equivalent or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

results.name: What Is Hiding In The Dark
